name: DSPDoubleSplitComplex
desc: A structure that represents a double-precision complex vector with the real and imaginary parts stored in separate arrays.

items.name: init(realp: UnsafeMutablePointer<Double>, imagp: UnsafeMutablePointer<Double>)
items.desc: Creates a new split complex structure.

items.name: var imagp: UnsafeMutablePointer<Double>
items.desc: An array of imaginary parts of the complex numbers.

items.name: var realp: UnsafeMutablePointer<Double>
items.desc: An array of real parts of the complex numbers.
